basic.floral_language:
Asparagus setaceus
Floriography: plain, innocent, guileless
Asparagus setaceus is a graceful evergreen foliage plant, with multi-branched soft stems and more tender green, small clusters of short branches in multiple layers with a clear structure, like the clouds, very elegant. Can climb and be arranged into various shape, usually put in the study, living room, to add an air of elegance and charm.
Asparagus setaceus likes a cool, shaded, and well ventilated environment, suitable under the scattered light. With proper care, will bloom sometimes with miniature white flowers.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers, white flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil
maintenance.sunlight: Resistant to shade, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Not resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once or twice monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely
